categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Selentia was a female individual who was a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Along with Adame, Selentia approached the smuggler Han Solo requesting to borrow his ship, the Millennium Falcon to travel to the Gomar sector as part of a mission on behalf of Leia Organa.
She accompanied Solo back to the Falcon and played a message from Organa explaining the mission.
Selentia first appeared in Han Solo 1, a 2016 comic book written by Marjorie Liu and illustrated by Mark Brooks.
